                   |  |     +--ro enabled?      boolean
                   |  |     +--ro identifier?   inet:as-number
                   |  |     +--ro member-as*    inet:as-number
                   |  +-- graceful-restart
                   |  |  +-- config
                   |  |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
                   |  |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                   |  |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
                   |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
                   |  |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
                   |  |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                   |  |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
                   |  +-- use-multiple-paths
                   |  |  +-- config
                   |  |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                   |  |  +-- ebgp
                   |  |  |  +-- config
                   |  |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |  |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
                   |  |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |  |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
                   |  |  +-- ibgp
                   |  |     +-- config
                   |  |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
                   |  |     +--ro state
                   |  |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
                   |  +-- route-selection-options
                   |  |  +-- config
                   |  |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
                   |  |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                   |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
                   |  |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                   |  |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                   |  |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                   |  |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
                   |  |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                   |  +-- afi-safis
                   |  |  +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
                   |  |     +-- afi-safi-name?             -> ../config/afi-safi-name
                   |  |     +-- config
                   |  |     |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
                   |  |     |  +-- enabled?         boolean
                   |  |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |  +--ro afi-safi-name?    identityref
                   |  |     |  +--ro enabled?          boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro total-paths?      uint32
                   |  |     |  +--ro total-prefixes?   uint32
                   |  |     +-- graceful-restart
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |     +--ro enabled?   boolean
                   |  |     +-- route-selection-options
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
                   |  |     |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                   |  |     |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                   |  |     |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                   |  |     |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
                   |  |     |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
                   |  |     |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                   |  |     |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                   |  |     |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                   |  |     |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
                   |  |     |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                   |  |     +-- use-multiple-paths
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +-- ebgp
                   |  |     |  |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
                   |  |     |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
                   |  |     |  +-- ibgp
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
                   |  |     +-- apply-policy
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |  |     |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |  |     |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |  |     |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |  |     |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |  |     |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |  |     |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |  |     +-- ipv4-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |  |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                   |  |     +-- ipv6-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |  |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |  |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |  +-- config
                   |  |     |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                   |  |     |  +--ro state
                   |  |     |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                   |  |     +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l2vpn-vpls
                   |  |     |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |     |     +-- config
                   |  |     |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     |     +--ro state
                   |  |     |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |     |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |     |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |     +-- l2vpn-evpn
                   |  |        +-- prefix-limit
                   |  |           +-- config
                   |  |           |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |           |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |           |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  |           +--ro state
                   |  |              +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  |              +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  |              +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |  +-- apply-policy
                   |     +-- config
                   |     |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     +--ro state
                   |        +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |        +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |        +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |        +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   +-- neighbors
                   |  +-- neighbor* [neighbor-address]
                   |     +-- neighbor-address?     -> ../config/neighbor-address
                   |     +-- config
                   |     |  +-- peer-group?           -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
                   |     |  +-- neighbor-address?     inet:ip-address
                   |     |  +-- enabled?              boolean
                   |     |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
                   |     |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
                   |     |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
                   |     |  +-- auth-password?        string
                   |     |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
                   |     |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
                   |     |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
                   |     |  +-- description?          string
                   |     +--ro state
                   |     |  +--ro peer-group?                -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
                   |     |  +--ro neighbor-address?          inet:ip-address
                   |     |  +--ro enabled?                   boolean
                   |     |  +--ro peer-as?                   inet:as-number
                   |     |  +--ro local-as?                  inet:as-number
                   |     |  +--ro peer-type?                 oc-bgp-types:peer-type
                   |     |  +--ro auth-password?             string
                   |     |  +--ro remove-private-as?         oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
                   |     |  +--ro route-flap-damping?        boolean
                   |     |  +--ro send-community?            oc-bgp-types:community-type
                   |     |  +--ro description?               string
                   |     |  +--ro session-state?             enumeration
                   |     |  +--ro last-established?          oc-types:timeticks64
                   |     |  +--ro established-transitions?   yang:counter64
                   |     |  +--ro supported-capabilities*    identityref
                   |     |  +--ro messages
                   |     |  |  +--ro sent
                   |     |  |  |  +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
                   |     |  |  |  +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
                   |     |  |  +--ro received
                   |     |  |     +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
                   |     |  |     +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
                   |     |  +--ro queues
                   |     |     +--ro input?    uint32
                   |     |     +--ro output?   uint32
                   |     +-- timers
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
                   |     |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
                   |     |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
                   |     |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
                   |     |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
                   |     |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
                   |     |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
                   |     |     +--ro negotiated-hold-time?             decimal64
                   |     +-- transport
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
                   |     |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
                   |     |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
                   |     |  |  +-- local-address?   union
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro tcp-mss?          uint16
                   |     |     +--ro mtu-discovery?    boolean
                   |     |     +--ro passive-mode?     boolean
                   |     |     +--ro local-address?    union
                   |     |     +--ro local-port?       inet:port-number
                   |     |     +--ro remote-address?   inet:ip-address
                   |     |     +--ro remote-port?      inet:port-number
                   |     +-- error-handling
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?           boolean
                   |     |     +--ro erroneous-update-messages?   uint32
                   |     +-- graceful-restart
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
                   |     |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
                   |     |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                   |     |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
                   |     |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
                   |     |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                   |     |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
                   |     |     +--ro peer-restart-time?   uint16
                   |     |     +--ro peer-restarting?     boolean
                   |     |     +--ro local-restarting?    boolean
                   |     |     +--ro mode?                enumeration
                   |     +-- logging-options
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
                   |     +-- ebgp-multihop
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
                   |     |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
                   |     |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
                   |     +-- route-reflector
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
                   |     |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
                   |     |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
                   |     +-- as-path-options
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
                   |     |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
                   |     |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
                   |     +-- add-paths
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
                   |     |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
                   |     |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
                   |     |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
                   |     |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     +-- use-multiple-paths
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                   |     |  +-- ebgp
                   |     |     +-- config
                   |     |     |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |     |     +--ro state
                   |     |        +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |     +-- apply-policy
                   |     |  +-- config
                   |     |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     |  +--ro state
                   |     |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |     |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |     +-- afi-safis
                   |        +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
                   |           +-- afi-safi-name?          -> ../config/afi-safi-name
                   |           +-- config
                   |           |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
                   |           |  +-- enabled?         boolean
                   |           +--ro state
                   |           |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
                   |           |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
                   |           |  +--ro active?          boolean
                   |           |  +--ro prefixes
                   |           |     +--ro received?    uint32
                   |           |     +--ro sent?        uint32
                   |           |     +--ro installed?   uint32
                   |           +-- graceful-restart
                   |           |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |           |  +--ro state
                   |           |     +--ro enabled?      boolean
                   |           |     +--ro received?     boolean
                   |           |     +--ro advertised?   boolean
                   |           +-- apply-policy
                   |           |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |           |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |           |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |           |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |           |  +--ro state
                   |           |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |           |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |           |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                   |           |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                   |           +-- ipv4-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |  |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |  |  +--ro state
                   |           |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                   |           |  +--ro state
                   |           |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                   |           +-- ipv6-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |  |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |  |  +--ro state
                   |           |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |  +-- config
                   |           |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                   |           |  +--ro state
                   |           |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                   |           +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l2vpn-vpls
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- l2vpn-evpn
                   |           |  +-- prefix-limit
                   |           |     +-- config
                   |           |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           |     +--ro state
                   |           |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |           |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |           |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                   |           +-- use-multiple-paths
                   |              +-- config
                   |              |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                   |              +--ro state
                   |              |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                   |              +-- ebgp
                   |                 +-- config
                   |                 |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   |                 +--ro state
                   |                    +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   +-- peer-groups
                      +-- peer-group* [peer-group-name]
                         +-- peer-group-name?      -> ../config/peer-group-name
                         +-- config
                         |  +-- peer-group-name?      string
                         |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
                         |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
                         |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
                         |  +-- auth-password?        string
                         |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
                         |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
                         |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
                         |  +-- description?          string
                         +--ro state
                         |  +--ro peer-group-name?      string
                         |  +--ro peer-as?              inet:as-number
                         |  +--ro local-as?             inet:as-number
                         |  +--ro peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
                         |  +--ro auth-password?        string
                         |  +--ro remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
                         |  +--ro route-flap-damping?   boolean
                         |  +--ro send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
                         |  +--ro description?          string
                         |  +--ro total-paths?          uint32
                         |  +--ro total-prefixes?       uint32
                         +-- timers
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
                         |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
                         |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
                         |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
                         |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
                         |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
                         |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
                         +-- transport
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
                         |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
                         |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
                         |  |  +-- local-address?   union
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro tcp-mss?         uint16
                         |     +--ro mtu-discovery?   boolean
                         |     +--ro passive-mode?    boolean
                         |     +--ro local-address?   union
                         +-- error-handling
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
                         +-- graceful-restart
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
                         |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
                         |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                         |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
                         |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
                         |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
                         |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
                         +-- logging-options
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
                         +-- ebgp-multihop
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
                         |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
                         |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
                         +-- route-reflector
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
                         |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
                         |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
                         +-- as-path-options
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
                         |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
                         |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
                         +-- add-paths
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
                         |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
                         |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
                         |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
                         |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         +-- use-multiple-paths
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                         |  +--ro state
                         |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                         |  +-- ebgp
                         |  |  +-- config
                         |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                         |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
                         |  |  +--ro state
                         |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                         |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
                         |  +-- ibgp
                         |     +-- config
                         |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
                         |     +--ro state
                         |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
                         +-- apply-policy
                         |  +-- config
                         |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                         |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                         |  +--ro state
                         |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                         |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                         |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                         +-- afi-safis
                            +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
                               +-- afi-safi-name?             -> ../config/afi-safi-name
                               +-- config
                               |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
                               |  +-- enabled?         boolean
                               +--ro state
                               |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
                               |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
                               +-- graceful-restart
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                               |  +--ro state
                               |     +--ro enabled?   boolean
                               +-- route-selection-options
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
                               |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                               |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                               |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                               |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
                               |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                               |  +--ro state
                               |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
                               |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
                               |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
                               |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
                               |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
                               |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
                               +-- use-multiple-paths
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                               |  +--ro state
                               |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                               |  +-- ebgp
                               |  |  +-- config
                               |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                               |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
                               |  |  +--ro state
                               |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                               |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
                               |  +-- ibgp
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
                               +-- apply-policy
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                               |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                               |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                               |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                               |  +--ro state
                               |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                               |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
                               |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
                               |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
                               +-- ipv4-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |  |  +-- config
                               |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |  |  +--ro state
                               |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                               |  +--ro state
                               |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                               +-- ipv6-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |  |  +-- config
                               |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |  |  +--ro state
                               |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |  +-- config
                               |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
                               |  +--ro state
                               |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
                               +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l2vpn-vpls
                               |  +-- prefix-limit
                               |     +-- config
                               |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                               |     +--ro state
                               |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                               |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                               |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
                               +-- l2vpn-evpn
                                  +-- prefix-limit
                                     +-- config
                                     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                                     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                                     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                                     +--ro state
                                        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                                        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                                        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping network-instance-type-dependent-config
    +-- enabled-address-families*   identityref
    +-- mtu?                        uint16
  grouping instance-endpoint-config
    +-- endpoint-id?   string
    +-- precedence?    uint16
    +-- type?          identityref
  grouping instance-endpoint-local-config
    +-- interface?      -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
    +-- subinterface?   -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
  grouping instance-endpoint-remote-config
    +-- remote-system?                inet:ip-address
    +-- virtual-circuit-identifier?   uint32
  grouping instance-endpoint-state
    +-- active?   boolean
  grouping instance-connection-point-config
    +-- connection-point-id?   string
  grouping instance-connection-point-state
  grouping table-config
    +-- protocol?         -> ../../../../protocols/protocol/config/identifier
    +-- address-family?   identityref
  grouping instance-interfaces-config
    +-- id?                            string
    +-- interface?                     -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
    +-- subinterface?                  -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
    +-- associated-address-families*   identityref
  grouping instance-interfaces-state
  grouping inter-table-policies-config
    +-- src-protocol?            -> ../../../../tables/table/config/protocol
    +-- address-family?          -> ../../../../tables/table[protocol=current()/../src-protocol]/config/address-family
    +-- dst-protocol?            -> ../../../../tables/table/config/protocol
    +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
  grouping network-instance-config
    +-- name?                  string
    +-- type?                  identityref
    +-- enabled?               boolean
    +-- description?           string
    +-- router-id?             yang:dotted-quad
    +-- route-distinguisher?   oc-ni-types:route-distinguisher
  grouping network-instance-state
  grouping protocols-config
    +-- identifier?       identityref
    +-- name?             string
    +-- enabled?          boolean
    +-- default-metric?   uint32
  grouping protocols-state
  grouping instance-interface-association-config
    +-- network-instance?   -> /network-instances/network-instance/name
  grouping encapsulation-config
    +-- encapsulation-type?      identityref
    +-- label-allocation-mode?   identityref
  grouping l2ni-instance
    +-- fdb
       +-- config
       |  +-- mac-learning?      boolean
       |  +-- mac-aging-time?    uint16
       |  +-- maximum-entries?   uint16
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro mac-learning?      boolean
       |  +--ro mac-aging-time?    uint16
       |  +--ro maximum-entries?   uint16
       +-- mac-table
          +-- entries
             +-- entry* [mac-address]
                +-- mac-address?   -> ../config/mac-address
                +-- config
                |  +-- mac-address?   yang:mac-address
                |  +-- vlan?          -> ../../../../../../vlans/vlan/config/vlan-id
                +--ro state
                |  +--ro mac-address?   yang:mac-address
                |  +--ro vlan?          -> ../../../../../../vlans/vlan/config/vlan-id
                |  +--ro age?           uint64
                |  +--ro entry-type?    enumeration
                +-- interface
                   +-- interface-ref
                      +-- config
                      |  +-- interface?      -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
                      |  +-- subinterface?   -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
                      +--ro state
                         +--ro interface?      -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
                         +--ro subinterface?   -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
  grouping l2ni-instance-common-config
    +-- mtu?   uint16
  grouping l2ni-fdb-mac-config
    +-- mac-learning?      boolean
    +-- mac-aging-time?    uint16
    +-- maximum-entries?   uint16
  grouping l2ni-encapsulation-config
    +-- control-word?   boolean
  grouping l2ni-mac-table-config
    +-- mac-address?   yang:mac-address
    +-- vlan?          -> ../../../../../../vlans/vlan/config/vlan-id
  grouping l2ni-mac-table-state
    +-- age?          uint64
    +-- entry-type?   enumeration
  grouping l2ni-mac-table-top
    +-- mac-table
       +-- entries
          +-- entry* [mac-address]
             +-- mac-address?   -> ../config/mac-address
             +-- config
             |  +-- mac-address?   yang:mac-address
             |  +-- vlan?          -> ../../../../../../vlans/vlan/config/vlan-id
             +--ro state
             |  +--ro mac-address?   yang:mac-address
             |  +--ro vlan?          -> ../../../../../../vlans/vlan/config/vlan-id
             |  +--ro age?           uint64
             |  +--ro entry-type?    enumeration
             +-- interface
                +-- interface-ref
                   +-- config
                   |  +-- interface?      -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
                   |  +-- subinterface?   -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
                   +--ro state
                      +--ro interface?      -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface/name
                      +--ro subinterface?   -> /oc-if:interfaces/interface[oc-if:name=current()/../interface]/subinterfaces/subinterface/index
